scripts.build:ios: rm -rf build/ && cp babel-ios.json .babelrc && babel --copy-files --out-dir build/ src/
scripts.build:android: rm -rf build/ && cp babel-android.json .babelrc && babel --copy-files --out-dir build/ src/
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build/ && cp babel-test.json .babelrc && babel --copy-files --out-dir build/src/ src/ && babel --copy-files --out-dir build/spec/ spec/
